title: Diagnostic Export Kit
summary: Shareable diagnostic readouts with stakeholder-ready summaries and follow-up checklists.
scope: Diagnostics facilitators, governance leads, and program managers packaging outputs.

includedArtifacts.title: Executive summary template
includedArtifacts.detail: One-page narrative structure for decisions, risks, and next-step ownership.

includedArtifacts.title: Mechanism follow-up checklist
includedArtifacts.detail: Action list that maps diagnostic findings to mechanisms and owners.

includedArtifacts.title: Evidence reference sheet
includedArtifacts.detail: Clause IDs, evidence tiers, and audit prompts attached to each diagnostic output.

includedArtifacts.title: Facilitation recap email
includedArtifacts.detail: Draft email to close the session with links to results, owners, and due dates.

useCases: Export diagnostics into executive or board-ready summaries.
Track follow-up tasks for mechanism remediation across teams.
Attach evidence references to audit packets without rewriting content.
Share diagnostic outputs with vendors or partners after joint reviews.
updateCadence: Monthly, synced with diagnostics release notes.

exports.description: Fork the templates as Markdown + CSV exports with version tags.
Instantly populate a Notion workspace with pre-wired tasks and meeting notes.
Generate a PDF packet with the diagnostic readout and supporting evidence.
